post.author: Black Dog
post.body:
I recommend you play this. It's pretty damn good.

Site: http://www.hylobatidae.org/minerva/phosphenes.shtml

Direct download : http://www.hylobatidae.org/minerva/file ... c.php?id=3

Screens:
http://www.halflife2.net/news//11257025 ... asis-2.jpg

post.author: Tron
post.body:
Holy bump Batman!

The third episode of this has just been released. I never played it on first release but have been going through the whole thing now and it is bloody incredible.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: I wanted to check out the site and look at the screenshots but I've gotten a 404 message everytime today.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: Sites and screens are down.
